dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of the forgotten, stranger.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Forgotten? I think I remember this place.

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: Perhaps you remember, but the world has forgotten.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: How could the world forget such a place?

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: It is not for us to question, but to rebuild.
